contributte/logging.name: logging
contributte/logging.description: :boom: Universal logging support to Tracy / Nette Framework (@nette)

last.name: v0.3.0
last.body:
Bump! ü•ï

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/logging/compare/v0.2.2...v0.3.0

Changes:
- lots of bc breaks (added typehints to interface)
- support only 2.5.x tracy

- TracyLoggingExtension
    - keep original Tracy Logger in DIC with different key logging.originalLogger

- SendMailLogger
    - not filter only Exception [#22]
    - sending also string messages with critical/error/exception priority (as in the original Logger)
    - configurable priority

- SentryLogger
    - removed final
    - added priority level
    - sending also string messages with critical/error/exception priority
    - configurable priority

- FileLogger
    - renamed from ExceptionFileLogger (because it does not log only exceptions but<priority>.log)

- NullLogger
    - with Tracy/ILogger interface [#10]

- Utils
    - used static methods formatLogLine,formatMessage from original Tracy\Logger

apitte/core.name: core
apitte/core.description: :wrench: PSR-7 based API framework. Heart of the apitte stack. Suitable to use with Nette Framework.

last.name: v0.5
last.body:
Diff: https://github.com/apitte/core/compare/v0.4...v0.5

New: 
- rewrited documentation
- Apitte is now wrapped into own `Application` class which must be used for proper functioning (see [documentation](https://github.com/apitte/core/tree/v0.5/.docs/setup.md#setup))
- error handler
  - transforms all thrown errors into response
    - could be disabled by option `catchException: false` in debug mode
    - apitte/negotiation is used for error transformation instead, if installed
  - if an PSR-3 compatible logger (like Monolog) is register in DIC then all errors except our special `ApiException` and it's descendants (`ServerErrorException`, `ClientErrorException`, ...) are logged with `error` severity
    - also previous errors from `ApiException` (`$exception->withPrevious($anotherException)`) are logged
- `ClientErrorException` and `ServerErrorException` have default error message https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/866418deffcdcdf031def983f5720bfcc402b1bc
- new `Request`, `Response` and `OpenApi` annotations (used by apitte/openapi) https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/31d700820036f1487dab9fbbfb197fb06f29a9c8
- `ApiResponse` contain constants with all HTTP response codes https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/342311bb41e00bbf43dc613959cff4728acf4eab
- request parameters with type `int` and `float` accept numbers prefixed with `+` https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/969f9d5c0309d7c029322eabb73cdffe6e90c1ab
- apitte/playground merged with [planette/playground](https://github.com/planette/playground)

Changes:
- simplified `ServiceHandler`, overriding implementations need changes https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/ccafbd4b6dcafe7a01a52d9e0744568a5ec2cc91
- `FileResponseDecorator` changed to static `FileResponseAdjuster` https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/2337b4e15204a613bf0cf0650a3c90f6c003bbdd
- `IRequestEntity` implementation is now optional for request mapper entities https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/38785e12df7bf2906100c748afedb880ee707948
- `IDecorator` splitted into strictly-typed interfaces https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/73597e713e958778c06f17753caa1441f8397778
- `ApiRequest` and `ApiResponse` are now required by all layers instead of `ServerRequestInterface` and `ResponseInterface` https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/d3c4ceb23ca8cc490d28027d6b34fc3c3dda2b53

Removals:
- support for alternative, undocumented syntax for most annotations https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/e7fced3e67d104548058a61630a172123f35cf63
- `Controller` annotation, controllers are now required to only implement `IController` https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/d0e38d9f0242f28a51ffe3c282b8b7f7b3c4411e
- `Schema` from request attributes, as it could be get from DIC https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/44c2e28d071c5971c5c127bbb351dd9fbc9fb5e1

Fixes:
- tags without value https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/028ee61b7a9fff7bf93b46048d0a5212509a3cd7
- url suffixes used in apitte/negotiation now support urls with variable parameter at the end (like `/users/{id}.debug`) https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/5c0ea433b184c17503870909549271978746dc94
- MessageException - default error code https://github.com/apitte/core/commit/1cf0d89840b063f893c632d69eef5f0aaa9cb36b

## Added

last.name: v0.3.0
last.body:
Bump!

Diff: https://github.com/contributte/translation/compare/v0.2.1...v0.3.0

Changes:
- added **Message wrapper** for message pluralize, eg. in Nette/Forms without doubled translate (tnx @jtojnar for hints)
- added **NotTranslate wrapper** for some user cases, eg. select box options loaded from database (tnx @jtojnar for hints)
- added TranslationProviderInterface for loading resources from another extension (tnx @MajklNajt for hints)
- bug fix, when neon file is empty (tnx @MajklNajt)
- some minor improvements
